title: Success, Wealth, Business & Growth Quotes
description: A comprehensive collection of 250+ quotes on success, abundance, money, wealth, marketing, prosperity, and growth from leading entrepreneurs and business minds.

quotes.quote: If you can't sell, you can't build a business.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Money chases value. Provide more value.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The market doesn't pay you for effort. It pays you for outcomes.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Volume negates luck.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Every skill you want is on the other side of reps.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The bigger the problem you solve, the bigger the paycheck.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Success is rented. The rent is due every day.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Hard work works. It's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You don't need more goals. You need more execution.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Most people want the outcome but not the process.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You become confident by becoming competent.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Most people don't fail because they're not capable; they fail because they're not consistent.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You don't need more time. You need more focus.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Your actions reflect your priorities.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Your future is built by the choices you make when no one is watching.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: If you're not embarrassed by who you were last year, you're not growing.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You're not overwhelmed. You're under-prioritized.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Fear is a compass. It shows you where to go.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: People who blame never win.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Discipline is doing the boring work.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The only way to get better at doing something is by doing it.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Skills are earned. Not given.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The people who win are the ones who're willing to do the work long after others have stopped.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Clarity comes from action, not thought.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The more you do, the more you can do.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The only shortcut is doing the work.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Repetition is the mother of mastery.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Your failures are tuition. Pay it and move forward.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The best way to learn is by failing fast and often.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: If you want to be great, you have to outlast most people.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You can't lose if you don't quit.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Most people are one decision away from a completely different life.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The person who works the hardest wins.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Information isn't power. Applied information is power.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: You can outwork talent when talent doesn't work.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The only way to change your life is to change what you tolerate.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Success is just the sum of small efforts repeated.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Skills are the real unfair advantage.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: Can't wait for Instagram to get rid of likes. Hoping it leads to the elimination of public vanity metrics.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: How can you give a fuck what people think when they don't have the full picture?
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Give me kind as fuck and B skills over complete asshole with A+ skills.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Slow down the macro (you got time in life)...speed up the micro (get more done daily).
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Be aggressively kind! If you are really happy inside – share that shit.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I suck at selling, I'm great at talking about the things I care about.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: The ability to not care about anybody else's opinions is the singular gateway to happiness.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Being yourself is so much easier. Who you trying to impress?
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Stop judging yourself, so many beating themselves up, did you try as hard as you could?
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Reputation is the ultimate currency.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you're a CEO and your employees aren't performing, that's on you.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Your focus on hating yesterday is killing your opportunity to love tomorrow.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Sacrificing for what you want is good. Suffering for what you want is not.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: When you stay in your lane and speak about things you've lived, it tends to work out.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Supply and demand is undefeated.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the cure.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: People are better at creating ceiling for themselves than any outside force.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you're so happy, then start putting happiness out into the universe.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You don't have to eliminate negative family, you have to limit it.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Happiness over flashiness – stop the confusion.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I genuinely like people, have compassion and understanding when things don't go well.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: People aren't willing to sacrifice for what they want.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Kindness is karma.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Anger and retaliation is never the reaction to venom. Never.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Practice positive perspective: 3P's.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I like the game of thinking, whether it's winning or losing.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: By the age of 7, 80% of my activities outside were business.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I'm such an animal of the market, that's what makes me so adaptable.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Don't judge the end of the first quarter.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I don't want your money, I want your admiration.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: A lot of you are looking for the next step, when the next step is what got you there in the first place.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you're good enough, no one is stopping you.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Kids want to be happy? Get off your parents payroll, the quicker they stop paying for stuff.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You find what you're looking for.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Everyone is trying to prove something with final results or showing they bought something.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you tell everyone you're going to do something and you change your mind 100 days in, that's a strength.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You either want to become the magazine or the person they put on the front of the magazine.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I lack entitlement. It's my strength.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Something that happened yesterday has nothing to do with tomorrow.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Want to prove something? Prove that you are enjoying the process of figuring yourself out.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You don't want what your friends want, so why the fuck would you care?
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you 100% enjoy the chaos and the unknown, you're an entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: The biggest asset in the world is your mindset.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Every parent is judging their kids based on yesterday, but your kids are living in today.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You fucked up. They're 49% of the equation, you are 51.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you think about business like a computer, culture is the operating system.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: When you find something you like and you're good at it, life is a lot better.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Makes me actually laugh how many people think kindness is a weakness... its the ultimate strength.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: It makes no sense why people think that at 18, 22, 30, that they have to have their life figured out.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: No matter where you start, how you finish is on you.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Nobody owes you shit.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Success is doing what you want, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Let fear be a counselor and not a jailer.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There are no failures in life, just results.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: More than anything else, I believe it's our decisions, not the conditions of our lives that determine our destiny.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Your income right now is a result of your standards, it is not the industry, it is not the economy.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The first thing these people have who succeed is that they've decided what the purpose of the game is.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Success in life is the result of good judgment. Good judgment is usually the result of experience.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Goals are like magnets. They'll attract the things that make them come true.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The secret to living is giving.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: It is not what we get. But who we become, what we contribute that gives meaning to our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity and responsibility to give something back.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The secret to wealth is simple: Find a way to do more for others than anyone else does.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Become more valuable. Do more. Give more. Be more. Serve more. And you will have the opportunity to earn more.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There's no shortage of money, only of people thinking big enough.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Never lower your price, add value.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Never depend on one action.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: You sleep like you're rich. I'm up like I'm broke.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Unwillingness to do what no one else will do is what separates the average from the exceptional.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: No matter how exceptional your product, you won't benefit financially if you can't sell it.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: One of the major differences between successful and unsuccessful people is that the former look for problems to resolve.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Success tends to bless those who are most committed to giving it the most attention.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Success is not an option or a choice, it is your duty.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Follow through on your duty. Success is your duty, obligation, and responsibility.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: The moment you start thinking someone else's gain is your loss, you limit yourself.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: The 10X Rule: You must set goals that are 10 times what you think you want.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Average is a failing plan.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be different.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to stand up for what you believe in, even if it means being the only one.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Income isn't linear. Cash flow swings. Some weeks test your confidence, others validate your strategy.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: That's not failure. That's the cost of building something real.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Forget startups, they are for dreamers. Buy real businesses.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: If you're not failing, you're not pushing your limits, and if you're not pushing your limits, you're not maximizing your potential.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can give someone is the power to be successful.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Giving people the opportunity to struggle rather than giving them the answer is more valuable.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the colour of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Do not act as if you were going to live ten thousand years. Death hangs over you.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: If any man despises me, that is his problem. My only concern is not doing or saying anything deserving of contempt.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Whenever you are about to find fault with someone, ask yourself the following question: What fault of mine most nearly resembles the one I am about to criticize?
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: More content, more brand. That's how you grow.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Brand is the ultimate leverage.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: The secret to success is this: work harder. When you think you've worked your hardest, go even deeper.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Confidence comes from keeping the promises you made to yourself.
quotes.author: Chris Williamson

quotes.quote: If nothing changes, what will your life actually look like in 5 years?
quotes.author: Stephen Bartlett

quotes.quote: It's really easy to lose focus on a life you didn't consciously choose.
quotes.author: Stephen Bartlett

quotes.quote: My dad had the best line about entrepreneurship: forget startups, buy real businesses.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Thinking about all the things you're too scared to try? Remember that most things are easier than you think.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Financial independence is the ultimate freedom.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Owning your own business affords you the freedom to be your own boss.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Fear in the face of opportunity is the biggest regret.
quotes.author: Codie Sanchez

quotes.quote: Principles are the foundation of everything.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Radical transparency is essential to success.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the best teachers if you're willing to learn from them.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Diversification is the only free lunch in investing.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to have good principles and to be disciplined about following them.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Pain plus reflection equals progress.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Understand that you don't know what you don't know.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: The biggest mistake people make is not asking for help.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Success comes from understanding how the world really works.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: You must be willing to look at reality objectively.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: Your unique perspective is your competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: You're not failing, you're learning.
quotes.author: Alex Hormozi

quotes.quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Your network is your net worth.

quotes.quote: Money is just a tool. It's a means to an end.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The only limit to your income is your belief about what's possible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Wealth is not about having money; it's about having options.

quotes.quote: The best time to start is when you realize you need to.

quotes.quote: The person with the best information wins.

quotes.quote: Your past does not determine your future.

quotes.quote: Belief is the thermostat that regulates what we allow ourselves to achieve.

quotes.quote: You cannot change what you do not acknowledge.
